effect.x_y: Changes the target’s ability to insomnia. If the target’s ability is truant or multitype, this move will fail.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Changes the target’s ability to insomnia. If the target’s ability is truant or multitype, this move will fail.

short_effect.x_y: Changes the target’s ability to Insomnia.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Changes the target’s ability to Insomnia.

flavor_text.x_y: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making the target’s Ability Insomnia.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making the target’s Ability Insomnia.
